extendedInfo.description: Since 1975 in electronics domain. Successfully introduced STAR SAT brand with its wide range of satellite receivers and equipment in the market.Star Sat offers optimistic and futuristic systems that comply with different market segments in quality, specification and price opportunity.Started with its first product line in analog receivers, which effectively have been sold 1.5 million sets worldwide. However STAR SAT in 1998 introduced its first digital satellite receiver with many features and specification. Models of digital set-top box as Free to Air, common interface, embedded system, motorized or a combined system and also offer extensive range of LNB's, actuators, cables & switches.Star Sat consider many market segments to introduce items that fit market categories and interest. In this way Star Sat gain wide distribution network that started in the Middle East to North Africa and part of Europe. Our operation offices are managing diversified distribution networks that are willing to predict and implement market needs and services after sales.Star Sat's main consideration in introducing a new item is customer satisfaction. That satarts from agents to end users and after sale service. Our main concern is to keep our commitment for the quality & customer satisfaction.

reviews.title: Website app
reviews.comment: A very easy way to see the company\'s products. 5* I\'d the design looked better
reviews.author: Alan Devereux
